src:
天理が５年ぶり優勝！３発１２得点で大阪桐蔭を撃破　近畿王者として明治神宮大会へ

04 Nov 2019

　「秋季高校野球近畿大会・決勝、天理１２－４大阪桐蔭」（４日、佐藤薬品スタジアム）
　天理（奈良３位）が大阪桐蔭（大阪１位）に打ち勝ち、秋の近畿大会で５年ぶり９回目の優勝を飾った。
　天理は一回、３番の河村が低めのボールを振り抜き、左翼席へ弾丸ライナーで運ぶ先制２ラン。六回には２本の適時打でリードを広げた後、山元がバスター打法で左翼席へ３ランを運び、一挙５点を追加した。七回には瀬が左翼席へソロ。九回にも４点を加え、先発全員の１６安打で１２得点を奪った。
　投げては先発マウンドに上がった背番号１９の１年生右腕、八回途中４失点の力投。長身から威力ある直球、落差の大きいチェンジアップを駆使して強力打線に対抗した。
　大阪桐蔭は２年ぶりの優勝はならず。エース左腕の藤江が天理打線につかまり、６回を投げ７失点。その後も４投手をつぎ込んだが、失点を重ねた。打線は一回に３番・西野がソロ。７点を追う八回には西野の適時二塁打などで３点を返したが、なお２死満塁の好機を生かせなかった。
　天理は準決勝でも今夏の甲子園を制した履正社（大阪２位）を撃破。秋の近畿王者として１５日に開幕する明治神宮大会に出場し、初戦は東北王者の仙台育英（宮城）と対戦する。
text:
Tenri won for the first time in 5 years! Defeat Osaka Toin with 3 goals and 12 goals. Go to Meiji Jingu tournament as Kinki champion.

04 Nov 2019

“Autumn High School Baseball Kinki Tournament, Final, Tenri 12-4 Osaka Toin” (4th, Sato Pharmaceutical Stadium)
Tenri (3rd in Nara) defeated Osaka Toho (1st in Osaka) and won the 9th victory in the Kinki tournament in autumn for the first time in 5 years.
Tenri is a first run of 2 runs in which No. 3 Kawamura swings out a lower ball and carries it to the left wing seat with a bullet liner. In the sixth round, after extending the lead with two hits in a timely manner, Yamamoto carried three runs to the left wing seat by the buster batting method, and added five points at once. Seventh solo solo to the left wing seat. In the ninth round, 4 points were added, and 12 points were scored with 16 hits from all the starting teams.
投 げ Thrown it to the starting mound, the first grader's right arm of No. 19, hitting 4 runs on the way eight times. The team struggled against a strong batting line by making full use of the tall, powerful straight ball and the large change-up.
Osaka Toho won't win for the first time in two years. Ace's left arm, Fujie, grabbed the Tenri batting line and threw 6 times to 7 goals. After that, he pitched four pitchers, but he ran out of goals. The batting line is solo by No. 3 and Nishino. In eight times following 7 points, Nishino returned 3 points in a timely double strike, but he still couldn't make the best use of 2 deaths.
Tenri defeats Narashosha (Osaka 2nd) who won Koshien this summer even in the semi-finals. Participated in the Meiji Jingu tournament starting on the 15th as the Kinki champion in autumn, and the first match will face the Tohoku champion Sendai Ikuei (Miyagi).
